title: BRIEF-ZF Steering Gear (India) Posts Sept-Qtr Net Loss After Tax Of 8 Mln Rupees
text:
BRIEF-ZF Steering Gear (India) Posts Sept-Qtr Net Loss After Tax Of 8 Mln Rupees

Stock Markets 11 minutes ago (Oct 15, 2019 13:30)

BRIEF-ZF Steering Gear (India) Posts Sept-Qtr Net Loss After Tax Of 8 Mln Rupees Oct 15 (Reuters) - ZF Steering Gear (India) Ltd : * SEPT-QUARTER NET LOSS AFTER TAX 8 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT OF 86.7 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO * SEPT-QUARTER REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 668.9 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS 1.09 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO

BRIEF-ZF Steering Gear (India) Posts Sept-Qtr Net Loss After Tax Of 8 Mln Rupees
